title: Collect Water from Morning Dew
brief: Gather significant amounts of drinking water by absorbing dew with cloth rags before sunrise.
steps: Step 1: Tie rags or tufts of fine grass around your ankles before sunrise while dew is present.
Step 2: Walk through dew-covered grass, allowing the rags or grass tufts to absorb moisture.
Step 3: When rags become saturated, wring the water into a container.
Step 4: Repeat the process until you have adequate water supply or until dew disappears.
Step 5: Continue process systematically - Australian natives can collect up to 1 liter per hour this way.
warnings: Must be done before sunrise while dew is still present.
Be aware of poisonous plants in the grass you're walking through.
